HEY BRIDGET!

you feel like it....

messages.subject: I'm home
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, I just wanted to drop a note and let everyone know that I am home from the hospital.  The surgery went well but the doctor found more than he
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,

I just wanted to drop a note and let everyone know that I am home from
the hospital. The surgery went well but the doctor found more than he
expected. I had a tumor. The results have not come back but he is
pretty sure it was benign. Anyway, I am too tired and groggy to read my
mail but I wanted to say hi.

Talk to you soon!

Bridget
S�och�in ar domhan,

At 18, our convictions are hills from which we look; at 45, they are
caves in which we hide.
-- F. Scott Fitzgerald
